movies.title: Live Gaming
movies.shortDescription: With the Twitch channel, you can watch the most popular broadcasts of the day, browse live broadcasts by the games you love and follow your favorite Twitch broadcasters.

movies.title: Roku Recommends
movies.shortDescription: Weekly recommendations of the latest and greatest channels, movies, TV shows, games, and more that are available now on your Roku device.

series.title: Let's Get Cookin'
series.shortDescription: The Paula Deen Channel is your instant access to new and hilarious Paula Deen cooking and lifestyle shows. Paula and her sons,  Jamie and Bobby, will cook up their delicious southern recipes and help you with hints and tips that make meal planning simple, affordable and easy.

series.title: Ideas Worth Spreading
